name: POK3D
description: Created in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare #40 (The more you have, the worse it is) Check our submission here! Chat with your friends and achieve the goals of your life! You only need your mouse to play POKED! __ PROTIPS:Hold left click to scroll in a discussion, but you can’t do it if you have notifications! There are 7 endings in the game, try to find them all! -- Twitter time! :  PROGRAMMING https://twitter.com/clementdussol  SFX & MUSIC https://twitter.com/doctorjedd  ART https://twitter.com/kizupixels  ANIMATION https://twitter.com/ThomasLean
